main event: A UFO was observed at Stewart AFB, New York, on 19 August 1958, and analyzed by an astronomer who suggested it was probably a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting involved a single object observed for two minutes,The object had a bright red glow similar to a phosphorescent object,Three witnesses were present during the observation,The object was tracked with ground-radar,The conclusion from the analysis indicated it was likely a balloon.
witness description: military personnel present during the sighting
